name: Stance Change
summary: If the user is Aegislash, when using an attacking move it transitions from Shield to Blade forme. If it uses King's Shield, Stance Change reverts it back to Shiled Forme.
viability: Stance Change is what makes Aegislash so good. It can turn from a defensive wall into an offensive threat. Because of Stance Change, Aegislash essentially has a Base Stat Total of 720 instead of 520.
